sections.heading: Who can get Disability
paragraphs: Individuals may be eligible for Disability if they have:
See if you might be eligible for Disability

sections.heading: What you could get
paragraphs: Your benefits may include a monthly payment and Medicare. Your payment amount is based on your work history before your disability began.
See what you could get from Disability

sections.heading: Try returning to work without losing Disability
paragraphs: You may be able to return to work or continue working without losing your Disability benefits.

sections.heading: What you need to report
paragraphs: Once you’re approved for Disability, you must report changes to your work, income, and personal information.
See what you need to report

sections.heading: Get Disability back if your benefit ended
paragraphs: If your Disability benefit ended, you might be able to restart it later.
Learn how to restart your benefit

subpages.title: What you must report while on Disability | SSA

sections.heading: Report changes to your work and income
paragraphs: Let us know right away if your work status or income changes, or if there’s a big improvement in your medical condition.

sections.heading: Tell us about changes to your personal record
paragraphs: Update the following to make sure you get timely and accurate payments:

subpages.title: Get Disability back if your benefit ended | SSA

paragraphs: If your Disability benefit ended because you returned to work and have been earning above the limits for too long, you might be able to restart it later if needed.

sections.heading: Within 5 years of your benefits ending
paragraphs: Call us and tell the representative you want to file for “expedited reinstatement” of your Disability benefit. You’ll answer a series of questions but won't need to file a new application. You might also get benefits for up to 6 months while we review your request.

Call +1 800-772-1213
Call TTY +1 800-325-0778 if you're deaf or hard of hearing.
Available in most U.S. time zones Monday through Friday, 8 a.m. to 7 p.m., in English, Spanish, and other languages.

sections.heading: After 5 years of your benefit ending
paragraphs: You’ll need to file a new application to get back on Disability.
You’ll need to file a new application to get back on Disability.
